q: How do I add a subscription?
a: Open the Add tab, choose a service, select plan and duration, enter price and renewal date, then click Add Subscription.

q: How do I edit or delete a subscription?
a: Go to the List tab. Use Edit to modify fields and Save to confirm, or Delete to remove the subscription.

q: Why do I see Access denied?
a: You are likely not authenticated. Please Sign up or Log in. After login, protected actions like adding subscriptions will work.
Renewal reminder emails are sent daily at 10:00 AM for subscriptions expiring within 7 days or already expired. Ensure SMTP is configured on the server.

q: What plans are available for Zee5 and SunNXT?
a: Zee5: Mobile, Premium, Premium 4K, Annual Premium. SunNXT: Mobile, Standard, Premium, Annual Premium. Netflix: Basic, Standard, Premium.
